telemetryId.title: Telemetry Id
telemetryId.description: The telemetry identifier for the provider.

searchPageRegexp.title: Search Page Regular Expression
searchPageRegexp.description: A regular expression which matches the search page of the provider.

queryParamName.title: Search Query Parameter Name
queryParamName.description: The name of the query parameter for the user's search string.

codeParamName.title: Partner Code Parameter Name
codeParamName.description: The name of the query parameter for the partner code.

taggedCodes.title: Partner Codes
taggedCodes.description: An array of partner codes to match against the parameters in the url. Matching these codes will report the SERP as tagged.

expectedOrganicCodes.title: Expected Organic Codes
expectedOrganicCodes.description: An array of partner codes to match against the parameters in the url. Matching these codes will report the SERP as organic:none which means the user has done a search through the search engine's website rather than through SAP.

organicCodes.title: Organic Codes
organicCodes.description: An array of partner codes to match against the parameters in the url. Matching these codes will report the SERP as organic:<partner code>, which means the search was performed organically rather than through a SAP.

followOnParamNames.title: Follow-on Search Parameter Names
followOnParamNames.description: An array of query parameter names that are used when a follow-on search occurs.

followOnCookies.title: Follow-on Cookies
followOnCookies.description: An array of cookie details that are used to identify follow-on searches.

extraCodeParamName.description: The query parameter name in the URL that indicates this might be a follow-on search.

extraCodePrefixes.description: Possible values for the query parameter in the URL that indicates this might be a follow-on search.

host.description: The hostname on which the cookie is stored.

name.description: The name of the cookie to check.

codeParamName.description: The name of parameter within the cookie.

extraAdServersRegexps.title: Extra Ad Server Regular Expressions
extraAdServersRegexps.description: An array of regular expressions that match URLs of potential ad servers.
